XML:

311262516 - old version revised masterwork, left for compatibility

Hardcoded:

9999 - exchange for the equivalent
9998 - exchange for a fee for АА
9997 - exchange for crystals

1002 - unseal B
1003 - reseal B
1005 - unseal A
1007 - reseal A
1008 - unseal S
4000 - paste SA in C, B
4001 - paste SA in A
40011 - paste SA in S/S80
4002 - recess SA
311262517 - completion masterwork
364790006 - Add PvP Bonus weapons
364790007 - Removing PvP bonus of weapons

Config:
showall — show even that can not be acquired, the default is true
notax — not impose taxes, default false
keepenchanted — the exchange of preserved sharpening, default false
nokey — if yes then checks for all of the ingredients, not just the equipment, default false
